concept.title: How can I add a special character (for example, trademark) to a DITA file?

prolog.author: Deborah Pickett
Anna van Raaphorst
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

conbody.p:
The <tm> element is recommended where you can use it. For example:
<tm trademark="DB2" tmtype="tm" tmclass="ibm">DITA</tm>
The tmtype for registered trademark is "reg", and for service mark it is "service".
